Key Match Events: Klay Thompson scored 16 points, 5 rebounds, 1 assist, and 5 turnovers in the game
Thompson made back-to-back 3-pointers in the fourth quarter to give the Mavericks a little life
Pre-Game Insights: Klay Thompson returned to play for the Dallas Mavericks after missing one game due to an illness
Post-Match Reflections: The Houston Rockets won the game 110-99
Without Luka Doncic, opponents have been aggressive in sending double teams to Kyrie Irving
Kyrie Irving had 16 points against the Rockets, while he had 46 points against the Portland Trail Blazers earlier
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jason Kidd went to Quentin Grimes and Jaden Hardy due to Thompson's struggles defensively
The Mavericks have struggled since Luka Doncic went out, losing 3 straight and 4 out of 5 games
